we accept BTC only

WHY BTC?

  • no bank no problem all you need is an internet access and a crypto wallet
  • btc uses block chain technology, making every transcation cryptographically secure and fraud resistant
  • btc is fast and borderless, no waiting days for bank transfers, bitcoin payments clear in minutes
  • avoid high card processing charges, btc are often lower than paypal or credit card transactions, especially for larger transactions
  • btc gives you more privicy and control over your financial info than most processors

we recommend using CASHAPP or COINBASE or EXODUS app to transfer the bitcoin:


    INSTRUCTIONS:
  • download the COINBASE app from google play-store/apple app-store
  • sign-up or login
  • create a crypto wallet in coinbase app in google-playstore or apple app-store
  • buy btc using a debit/credit card or bank transfer or local store
  • scan this QR code with camera icon in the CASHAPP or COINBASE app when you want to transfer the bitcoin
  • OR you copy and paste the bitcoin wallet address then transfer the bitcoin
  • we would send you a confirmation email
  • then you could ask for a refund before we begin building your website

you pay us 30% initially, after website deployment to production you pay the remaining 70% then we handoff files and credentials

Project Timelines

  • 1 to 5 Pages: 1 to 2 weeks
  • Medium to Large: 2 to 4 weeks
  • Enterprise Sites: Minimum 5 weeks

Project Phase Breakdown

Planing -> design -> development -> production -> deployment = 1 to 8 weeks duration

Phase 1: Architecture & Content (Start of Project)

  • Strategic Copywriting (FREE): Crafting high-converting text tailored to your industry policies and manuals.
  • UI/UX Design ($50/page): Creating the visual interface for your e-commerce, healthcare, or real estate platform.
  • AI Training Setup: Mapping out the 24/7 customer care agents and keyword search logic.

Phase 2: Development & AI Integration

  • Full-Stack Build ($100/page): Developing fast-loading, reliable pages that avoid technical debt.
  • AI Implementation: Building digital staff trained on your specific business data for live calls and chats.
  • Security Layer (FREE): Implementing enterprise-grade protection as a standard feature.

Phase 3: Optimization & Deployment (End of Project)

  • SEO & Rich Results ($30/page): Configuring structured data so your site stands out in search results.
  • Accessibility & Compliance ($50/page): Ensuring the site is inclusive and meets all legal web standards.
  • Hosting Calculation: Finalizing hosting costs based on the total project size and technical requirements.
  • Launch & Maintenance ($70/month): Moving the site to production with ongoing support.
